plugin_info.plugin_description: Run a pyomo model and automatically import the results to Hydra.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: For more information visit hydra platform website

arg.name: network
arg.help: ID of the network where results will be imported to. This coincides with the network exported to pyomo..

arg.name: scenario
arg.help: ID of the underlying scenario used for the most recent simulation run.

arg.name: data-file
arg.help: Full path to the data file used to set data the simulation.

arg.name: pyomo-model
arg.help: Full path to the pyomo model (*.py) used for the simulation.

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: Specify the URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config
